content: However, during the fourth quarter, the business experienced a year-over-year revenue decline of $0.4 million, due to the loss of a single contract. Fourth quarter revenues for our consulting business were $1.1 million, a decrease of 25% year-over-year and 40% sequentially. Full year 2022 revenues for our consulting business were $6.4 million, a decrease of $0.4 million or 6% year-over-year. In comparison to prior year periods, Shield revenues increased $0.2 million for the quarter and $0.7 million for the full year, both representing a year-over-year increase of 124%.
